{{flavour|A special armour made for nagas, to wear over their tails.}}

'''Naga [[barding]]s''' are a type of armour intended for [[naga]]s to wear in place of [[boots]], which do not fit on their serpentine lower halves. Although significantly less common than boots, they provide double the base AC and can be enchanted twice as heavily. In exchange, they do have a slight [[encumbrance rating]], but this has no effect on your spellcasting, [[stealth]], or accuracy. The only negative impact is a loss of 2 points to your [[ev]]asion. 

Possible egos include:

*[[Fire resistance]]
*[[Cold resistance]]
*[[Flying]]
*[[Stealth]]

AC from naga barding is not penalized by a naga's [[Bad mutations#Deformed Body|oddly-shaped body]]. Non-nagas cannot wear naga barding, though [[centaur]]s have [[centaur barding]], a type of barding intended for them.

==History==
*In [[0.26]], [[centaur barding]]s and [[naga barding]]s were merged into a single item type called [[barding]]s.
*In [[0.12]], bardings of levitation were replaced with bardings of flying.
